content: before the end of needle k2tog k1 needles 3 and 4 continue dragonfly pattern needle 1 k1 sl1 k1 psso k to end row 2 needle 2 k needles 3 and 4 continue dragonfly pattern needle 1 k repeat row 1 and 2 until there are 15 stitches remaining on each needle continue with pattern on needles 3 and 4 and k on needles 1 and 2 until sock reaches 2 from end of the foot toe row 1 needle 1 k1 sl k1 psso k to end needle 2 k to 3 before end k2tog k1 needle 3 k1 sl1 k1 psso k to end needle 4 k to 3 befor end k2tog k1 row 2 k around repeat row 1 and 2 until there are 5 st on each needle- combine needles 1 and 2 and 3 and 4 so that there are 5 st on each needle graft toe and weave in ends felted cavies books cavy sweaters yarn copyright c 2003-2007 jocelyn sertich http //cavyshops com/dragonflysocks html page 3 of 3
